r.d: Package for communicating with NNTP/Usenet servers
r.n: - This release is NOT backward compatible with v0.11.3, since all non-stable features (classes, methods etc.) have been removed!!! - Users of releases between 0.3.x and 0.11.x should consider v1.1.x or v1.2.x in stead. (This release is meant only as a final replacement for v0.2.5 - and of cause as a way to finally get rid of the former protocol implementation). - Backward compatible with v0.2.5 (this is ONLY guarantied in v1.0.x releases, and may be removed in the future).
